command.text: SELECT Pyempmfs.Emp_No, Pyempmfs.Emp_NOt, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm1, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm2, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm3, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm4, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm5, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nm, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme1, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme2, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme3, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme4, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme5, Pyempmfs.Emp_Nme, Pyempmfs.Birth_Plac, Pyempmfs.Reljan, Reljan.Reljan_nm AS ReljanReljan_nm, Pyempmfs.Educt_Type, TheEduct_Type.Educt_Nm AS TheEduct_TypeEduct_Nm, Pyempmfs.Birth_Date, Pyempmfs.Uniq_no, Pyempmfs.Civl_No, Pyempmfs.Month_Salry, Pyempmfs.Status_Type, TheStatus_Type.Status_Nm AS TheStatus_TypeStatus_Nm, Pyempmfs.Emp_Tel, Pyempmfs.Blood_Type, TheBlood_Type.ModifiedBy AS TheBlood_TypeModifiedBy, Pyempmfs.Depm_No, Depm_.Depm_Nm AS Depm_Depm_Nm, Pyempmfs.Job_No, Job_.Job_Nm AS Job_Job_Nm, Pyempmfs.EMP_EMAIL, Pyempmfs.Gender, Pyempmfs.Kindg_id, Pyempmfs.Cntry_No, Cntry_.Cntry_Nm AS Cntry_Cntry_Nm, Pyempmfs.Notes, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_Nt, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_Plc, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_No, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_Sdt, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_Edt, Pyempmfs.Pasprt_Ty, Pyempmfs.Work_Expyer, Pyempmfs.Residn_No, Pyempmfs.Residn_Ty, Pyempmfs.Residn_Plc, Pyempmfs.Residn_Chld, Pyempmfs.Residn_Sdt, Pyempmfs.Residn_Edt, Pyempmfs.Job_Stu, Job_Stu.Emp_Stunm AS Job_StuEmp_Stunm, Pyempmfs.Job_Date, Pyempmfs.Start_Date, Pyempmfs.End_Date, Pyempmfs.Work_Lic, Pyempmfs.Work_Period, Pyempmfs.Work_StDt, Pyempmfs.Work_Endt, Pyempmfs.Entr_Date, Pyempmfs.Emp_Zipnm, Pyempmfs.Emp_Zipno, Pyempmfs.Issu_Lic, Pyempmfs.Ownr_No, Ownr_cmp_.Grp_Nm AS Ownr_cmp_Grp_Nm, Ownr_cmp_Grp_.Grp_Nm AS Ownr_cmp_Grp_Grp_Nm, Pyempmfs.Psprt_Rcv, Pyempmfs.Group_ID, Pyempmfs.contyp, Pyempmfs.Nikname, Pyempmfs.On_WorkDt1, Pyempmfs.Emp_Ref, Pyempmfs.Depm_Civlno, Pyempmfs.Emp_Adrsno, Pyempmfs.Ownr_Near, Pyempmfs.Pasp_Endt, Pyempmfs.Rsdn_Endt, Pyempmfs.Emp_Pbox, Pyempmfs.Int_Ext, Pyempmfs.MMonth_Salry, Pyempmfs.MJob_No, Pyempmfs.Basic_Temp, Pyempmfs.Specl_Need, Pyempmfs.Specl_NeedTyp, Pyempmfs.Gov_Cntrct, Pyempmfs.Cmp_No, Pyempmfs.Dpm_No, Pyempmfs.Hldy_Typ, Pyempmfs.Hldy_Period, Pyempmfs.Prev_Blnc, Pyempmfs.On_WorkDt, Pyempmfs.Loc_No, Loc_.Loc_Nm AS Loc_Loc_Nm, Pyempmfs.Insurance_No, Pyempmfs.branch, Thebranch.Desc1 AS ThebranchDesc1, Thebranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Thebranchsgmsgm_Nm, ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoName AS ThebranchsgmOpcoOpcoName, ThebranchGender.Gender AS ThebranchGenderGender, Thebranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS ThebranchstageShortDesc1, Thebranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS ThebranchschtypschtypDesc, Pyempmfs.sgm, sgm.sgm_Nm AS sgmsgm_Nm, sgmOpco.OpcoName AS sgmOpcoOpcoName, Pyempmfs.user_id, Pyempmfs.lastevlu, Pyempmfs.unitcost, Pyempmfs.evluDegree, Pyempmfs.picimage, Pyempmfs.ModifiedBy, Pyempmfs.ModifiedOn, Pyempmfs.CreatedBy, Pyempmfs.CreatedOn, Pyempmfs.Cnt_Stdt, Pyempmfs.Cnt_Endt, Pyempmfs.Tkt_No, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Fraqncy, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Adult, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Child, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Class, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Destn, Pyempmfs.Tkt_Sector, Pyempmfs.Bsc_Salary, Pyempmfs.Hous_Alw, Pyempmfs.Trnsp_Alw, Pyempmfs.Other_Alw, Pyempmfs.Food_Alw, Pyempmfs.Emp_Vactn, Pyempmfs.Emp_Acntno, Pyempmfs.Cntyp_No, Pyempmfs.Pymnt_No, Pyempmfs.Bnk_No, Bnk_.Bnk_Acc AS Bnk_Bnk_Acc, Pyempmfs.Sub_Bnk, Sub_Bnk.Bnk_Acc AS Sub_BnkBnk_Acc, Pyempmfs.Bnk_Brn, Pyempmfs.Job_Date1, Pyempmfs.Wrk_Hour, Pyempmfs.Wrk_days, Pyempmfs.Car_No, Pyempmfs.salryadd, Pyempmfs.Depm_No1, Pyempmfs.Job_No1, Pyempmfs.STMAXTIME, Pyempmfs.EDMAXTIME, Pyempmfs.CTMAXTIME, Pyempmfs.minavil, Pyempmfs.Wrkstu_No, Pyempmfs.Costcntr_No, Pyempmfs.ACCNo, Pyempmfs.ACCNo1, Pyempmfs.salrycat, salrycat.grade_desc_a AS salrycatgrade_desc_a, salrycatEarning_.Earning_Nm AS salrycatEarning_Earning_Nm, Pyempmfs.allow1, Pyempmfs.allow2, Pyempmfs.allow3, Pyempmfs.allow4, Pyempmfs.allow5, Pyempmfs.allow6, Pyempmfs.Earning_no, Earning_.Earning_Nm AS Earning_Earning_Nm, Pyempmfs.allow7, Pyempmfs.Bankiban, Ownr_cmp_.Cmp_Nm AS Cmp_Nm1, Ownr_.Ownr_Nm, Ownr_.Ownr_Sign, Ownr_.Civl_No AS Civl_No_ownr, Ownr_.Work_File, Ownr_.Ownr_ID, Ownr_.Busn_File, Ownr_.Trad_Nm ,"acc_"."Acc_Nm" "acc_Acc_Nm", "acc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "acc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm","acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "acc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm", "acc_Acc_Bndaccclass"."accountclass" "acc_Acc_Bndaccclassaccountclass" ,"acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab"."Acc_Nm" "acc_Acc_BndAcc_BabAcc_Nm" FROM dbo.Pyempmfs AS Pyempmfs LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS Reljan ON Pyempmfs.Reljan = Reljan.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyempEdu AS TheEduct_Type ON Pyempmfs.Educt_Type = TheEduct_Type.Educt_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS TheStatus_Type ON Pyempmfs.Status_Type = TheStatus_Type.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.pyBlood AS TheBlood_Type ON Pyempmfs.Blood_Type = TheBlood_Type.Blood_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pydepm AS Depm_ ON Pyempmfs.Depm_No = Depm_.Depm_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.pyjobs AS Job_ ON Pyempmfs.Job_No = Job_.Job_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS Cntry_ ON Pyempmfs.Cntry_No = Cntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pyempstu AS Job_Stu ON Pyempmfs.Job_Stu = Job_Stu.Emp_stu LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pyownrmf AS Ownr_ ON Pyempmfs.Ownr_No = Ownr_.Ownr_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pycnstnt AS Ownr_cmp_ ON Ownr_.cmp_no = Ownr_cmp_.Cmp_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Groupcnst AS Ownr_cmp_Grp_ ON Ownr_cmp_.Grp_No = Ownr_cmp_Grp_.Grp_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyLocation AS Loc_ ON Pyempmfs.Loc_No = Loc_.loc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Thebranch ON Pyempmfs.branch = Thebranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS Thebranchsgm ON Thebranch.sgm = Thebranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS ThebranchsgmOpco ON Thebranchsgm.OpcoID = ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoIDidentity LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS ThebranchGender ON Thebranch.Genderid = ThebranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Thebranchstage ON Thebranch.stagecode = Thebranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Thebranchschtyp ON Thebranch.schtypid = Thebranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS sgm ON Pyempmfs.sgm = sgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS sgmOpco ON sgm.OpcoID = sgmOpco.OpcoIDidentity LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PybnkAcc AS Bnk_ ON Pyempmfs.Bnk_No = Bnk_.Bnk_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PybnkAcc AS Sub_Bnk ON Pyempmfs.Sub_Bnk = Sub_Bnk.Bnk_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.grade AS salrycat ON Pyempmfs.salrycat = salrycat.grade_code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pyerntsalyp1 AS salrycatEarning_ ON salrycat.Earning_No = salrycatEarning_.Earning_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Pyerntsalyp1 AS Earning_ ON Pyempmfs.Earning_no = Earning_.Earning_No LEFT OUTER JOIN "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "acc_" on "Pyempmfs"."ACCNo" = "acc_"."Acc_No" LEFT OUTER JOIN "dbo"."GLmfbab" "acc_Clsacc_" on "acc_"."Clsacc_No" = "acc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" LEFT OUTER JOIN "dbo"."GLmfband" "acc_Acc_Bnd" on "acc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" LEFT OUTER JOIN "dbo"."accountclasslist" "acc_Acc_Bndaccclass" on "acc_Acc_Bnd"."accclass" = "acc_Acc_Bndaccclass"."accountclassid" LEFT OUTER JOIN "dbo"."GLmfbab" "acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab" on "acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bab" = "acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab"."Acc_Bab"

field.name: acc_Acc_BndAcc_BabAcc_Nm
field.label: acc Acc Bnd Acc Bab Acc Nm

view.label: Drivers
view.filter: Job_Stu!=3 and Job_No=29 or Job_No=30 or Job_No=48 or Job_No=50 or Job_No=98 or Job_No=10086

action.data: update pyempmfs set Loc_No=@Parameters_LocNo where emp_no=@Emp_No
